AutomatedActionCondition.name: AutomatedActionCondition
AutomatedActionCondition.description: Represents the logical operator details for evaluating conditions in an automated action.

ConditionNumber.description: Reference number of the condition containing advanced filter logic.

IsLocked.description: Indicates whether the automated action condition record is locked or not.

MayEdit.description: Indicates whether the automated action condition record can be edited or not.

Operator.description: The logical operator for this condition.

ReferenceField.description: The field to use for this condition.

Value.description: The value to compare to the ReferenceField.
